item.title: Building WebRTC for iOS/macOS with Xcode
item.description: Introduction WebRTC (Web Real-Time Communication) is a powerful open-source technology that enables real-time communication capabilities in web and mobile applications. While WebRTC is well-supported in web browsers, incorporating it into iOS applications often requires (re)building a binary framework to ensure seamless integration and improved performance. In this article, we will provide a comprehensive step-by-step guide on how to integrate WebRTC into any iOS/macOS application and building it from source entirely in Xcode.
